name: Jam Overflow
description:
Created for Kindred Games Community Jam #9.

You got some jams from the market. However, the bees nearby doesn't like your decision since it is partially honey :( 

Fortunately, you have a jam shooter (?) to shoot at the angry bees and give them their food while maintaining a distance. Your goal is to survive the stinging bees as long as possible while giving them jam.

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot jam bullets. Spawn pool of jam on collide with bee or after 1 second.

When a bee has stayed on a pool of jam for a while (Denoted by the size of the bar above them, smaller = time remaining), then it will despawn.

Check this out maybe
